channel.title: My runserver dont work
channel.description:
If i do runserver then there comes very fast a blackscreem with reapage scape and disapear i got jdk 6 upd 5 and 11
i got this at my runserver if i do ''edit''
@echo off color 0a title ReapageScape v1 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
i dont know whats the problem i am trying to get a server now for 1 year and i tough i now got all and now i got this problem =.=
who can help me ?
Thank you dylanno

item.title: My runserver dont work
item.dc:creator: @strkido strkido
item.description:
@strkido wrote:

this shows u got 317 base so it is like this

@echo off
color 0a
title ReapageScape v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

i would have it like this
@echo off
color 0a
title your server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause(not sure if this needs to be here)

srry not good at this 1 but i used always to have something like

@echo off
title
“c:/program files/java/jdk6_0_11”
pause

something like that but im not sure o and btw always have backup files my server got ruined b’cuz i didnt have backup files
